REASON: Horrible gas pains, bloating, cramps, anxiety, insomnia, and intense abdominal pain and distention.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CLINDAMYCIN PHO: DO NOT TAKE THIS DRUG unless there is NOTHING else that will work.  I took it as an adjunct to Cipro for diverticulitis, and I have never had a more miserable 36 hours.  Spent a sleepless night with abdominal pain, gas, distention, and horrible bloating, and had to go to the emergency room the next day for treatment antibiotic-caused colitis, courtesy of Clindamycin.  I still feel fragile.  This is a terrible drug,
